name: Senior Associate to Strategy & Operations Consulting
description:
Your responsibilities will include, but may be not limited to:

  • Conducting market research to understand key business trends and develop strategic view

  • Conducting analysis of businesses to identify various opportunities for improvements

  • Provide recommendations for the clients’ issues (including topics on strategy, target operating model, business processes, operations, market analysis and feasibility studies);

  • Development of reports/ presentations on different topics

  • Assisting in the design, development, test and implementation of new business processes

  • Managing a team of junior colleagues on daily basis

  • Communicate with clients on project execution

  • Work closely with senior colleagues

Knowledge, Skills and Experience:

  • Completed University degree in business field (Finance, Accounting, Economics, Management);

  • At least 3 years of relevant experience within consulting, banking and/or other industry sectors;

  • Minimum one (1) year of experience as an in-charge / senior / team lead;

  • Russian – fluent, English – advanced/fluent (both oral and written)


Soft skills:

  • Ability to operate in multitask environment;

  • Strong presentation skills (including PowerPoint slides structuring and preparation);

  • Availability for overtime work and tough deadlines;

  • Business and analytical writing skills (both in Russia and in English).

  • Candidate needs to be adaptable, able to manage projects independently and be ready to assume a high level of responsibility as a member of a team;

  • Ability to comfortably interact with clients and colleagues in a professional and mature manner;

  • Ability to manage junior colleagues;

  • Strong work ethics, integrity and judgment;

  • Strong intellectual curiosity;

  • Highly organized, detail oriented, proactive with strong interpersonal skills
